title: Mainland Chinese toxicity
body:
Hi does the review system review end game chat typed in simplified Chinese at all? 

Just had this guy telling the other guy to kill himself and the other one saying he will kill his mother and a whole array of things that can't even be typed out here. They are particularly rude to Koreans and Japanese too. What's with this entitlement attitude of the mainland Chinese?

replies.body: 1st of all, show some proofs. Then we'll go from there.
2nd of all, it's not that hard to find people swearing in 'chinese', but often it's just immature little douches who think they're so smart with their google translate.

3rd point.

Of course there are cases of toxic Chinese players, no doubt about that. But we need to get into the details in order to understand the situation.

Some? Majority? All? I don't know, the people who complains don't know. There is not enough evidence to form a conclusive statement, suggesting the toxicity out of Chinese players are becoming a problem. Hence, i don't understand why people are using "Chinese" as an umbrella term, without providing any statistical data.
What he has typed is mere words as well. Why don't you take your own advice and move along. Let those who want to engage in a rational discussion make their points.
